json: {"filters":[],"columns":[["name","Item Price"],["price_list","Item Price"],["item_code","Item Price"],["item_name","Item Price"],["item_description","Item Price"],["price_list_rate","Item Price"],["buying","Item Price"],["selling","Item Price"],["currency","Item Price"]],"sort_by":"Item Price.modified","sort_order":"desc","sort_by_next":null,"sort_order_next":"desc"}
name: Material-wise Price List Rate
query:
SELECT name AS "ID::120", price_list AS "Price List::150", item_code AS "Material Code:Link/Item:120",
item_name AS "Material Name::120", item_description AS "Material Description::150", 
price_list_rate AS "Rate:Currency:120", buying AS "Buying::100", selling AS "Selling:100",
currency AS "Currency::100"
FROM `tabItem Price`
ORDER BY modified DESC;
